item.title: Ensuring Resiliency: High Availability and Disaster Recovery Strategies
item.description: High Availability (HA) and Disaster Recovery (DR) are critical strategies in cloud computing to ensure services are continuously available and resilient against failures. Designing HA & DR Most of the services can be differentiated as compute and storage; these are the two key components when building resilient software architectures. item.title: Enterprise Product - Things to consider
item.description: Developing an enterprise product is a complex endeavour that demands meticulous planning and execution. Here’s a comprehensive checklist that can serve as your roadmap to success. Whether you’re launching a web server or a multifaceted application, these steps are critical for ensuring business continuity Business Case Business Need is defined Product architecture and high level technical architecture is determined High-level technical plan is devised Estimated Budgets allocated Migration strategy, if applicable, is established Service Delivery Procedures are determined Necessary resources assigned Definite Commitment to technical and security standards established.
